Title: Maximize Your Day for Success with Ed Mylett
Description:
Join us as our host, George Kamel, talks to Ed Mylett. Ed is an entrepreneur, bestselling author, speaker and host of The Ed Mylett Show. We dive into his new book, The Power of One More, and unpack the two keys he says lead to happiness and success. Later in the episode, George chats with Dr. John Delony—a Ramsey Personality, #1 national bestselling author of Own Your Past, Change Your Future, mental health expert and host of The Dr. John Delony Show. He shares how to push through resistance and the strategies he uses to stay well while going through tough seasons.

 

You’ll learn:

  • How to manipulate time to get more done
  • How inconvenience is the key to greatness
  • The importance of invisible progress
  • The cost of avoiding hard things
